chapter.text: Chas prybude koly nebo ruptured
Tse pidkorytʹsya do yoho Lorda ta zakinchuyutʹsya
zemlya bude leveled
Tse bude eject yoho zmist, yak tse erupts
Tse pidkorytʹsya do yoho Lorda ta zakinchuyutʹsya
O humans, vy irreversibly holovuyete dlya zboriv z vashym Lordom
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys u yoho pravi ruka
Yoho rozrakhunok bude lehkyy
Vin povernetʹsya do yoho lyudey joyfully
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys pozadu yoho spyny
Vin bude yikhatysya z remorse
Ta spalyatʹ u Pekli
Vin zvychayno diyav zukhvalo sered yoho lyudey
Vin podumav shcho vin bude nikoly ne poklykanyy do vidpovidi
Tak diysno, yoho Lord Seer yoho
ya urochysto prysyahayu rozhevymy sutinkamy
Ta nich yak tse rozpovsyudzhuyetʹsya
Ta misyatsʹ ta yoho phases
Vy posunete z stadiyi do stadiyi
Chomu vony ne vvazhayutʹ
Ta koly Quran deklamuyetʹsya yim, vony ne upadutʹ prostrate
Tse tomu, shcho tsey khto disbelieved vidkhylyayutʹ (Quran)
BOH znaye tsilkom yikhni nayhlybshi dumky
Obitsyayutʹ yim bolisnyy retribution
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, vony otrymuyutʹ vynahorodu shcho dobre-zasluhovuyetʹsya
